'''''Parma Nölé'' 7''' is the seventh issue of the [[North East Tolkien Society]] journal ''[[Parma Nölé]]'', for August/September [[2003]].

==Contents==
* Letters from the Chairman and Co-chair of the Heren Istarion Fellowship
* [[Anthony S. Burdge]]: "Interview with Games Workshop's Games Developer by Alessio Cavatore"
* [[Anthony S. Burdge]]: "Shadow and Flame: Games Workshop Product"
* [[Anthony S. Burdge]]: "Fog on the Barrow Downs: Games Workshop Product Review"
* [[Sabrina Jackson]]: "An Unsuitable Hero"
* [[Joe Piela]]: "Arms and Armor In J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth"
* [[Anthony S. Burdge]]: "An Interview with Joe Piela"
* [[Constance St. Clair Schuchardt]] & Namiko Sarah Hitotsubashi: "The Lay of Galadriel"
* Esther Zuckerman: "Sorrow in Lothlorien"
* [[Anthony S. Burdge]]: "Why Tolkien?"
* Paulina J. Gibson: "Why Tolkien?"
* [[Jessica Burke]]: "Myth, Fear, and Fantasy: The Function of ''The Lord of the Rings'' In Society"
